FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI.PopUpGUI

Class ArtistPopUp

  • java.lang.Object
    • FestivalPlanner.GUI.AbstractGUI
      • FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI.PopUpGUI.AbstractCreationPopUp
        • FestivalPlanner.GUI.AgendaGUI.PopUpGUI.ArtistPopUp

  • public class ArtistPopUp
extends AbstractCreationPopUp
    Contains a PopUp used for creating a new Artist.
